statusDetails.message:
Don't know how to encode {"account":{"name":"ventastesting293659","phone":"1324567989","professional":false}} as a byte stream.

Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type.
For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("application/json, text/plain. */*", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
